name: Bots Revenge
description:
You were kidnap by an evil  corporation and you have to escape from the cyborgs. Make your way out, grab a gun and shoot! 

Isometric bullet hell.

(Final project made for my OOP class, with implementation of my own data structures.)

*Assets were downloaded from:
https://www.pngguru.com/free-transparent-background-png-clipart-ucjuo
https://opengameart.org/content/antifareas-rpg-sprite-set-1-enlarged-w-transparent-background-fixed
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/2d-pixelart-isometric-blocks-115039
